sentences.en: Adjure an expert to help solve, thank.
sentences.cn: 恳请专家帮忙解答一下, 谢谢.
恳请大家帮帮忙, 谢谢!

sentences.en: I adjure you by the Lord that this letter be read to all the brothers.

words.tran_cn: 恳请，恳求；起誓；（以起誓或诅咒等形式）命令

trans.tran_en: to order or try to persuade someone to do something
